hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RELEASEZIP
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
URL of released version.

Version 2.3
Original link: http://wanamlite.com/2014/04/03/adam-kernel-galaxys4-lte-v2-3-android-kitkat//
URL: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/486665/kernels/jflte/Adam/GT-I9505_Adam.Kernel.2.3.CWM.zip
MD5: C61B4FBD93D674A473CAD2F7D57F46A6

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
set -e
# Clean up #git clean -fdx #git reset --hard HEAD
source /srv/jenkins/dualboot-kernel.sh
select_toolchain 4.6-ndk #build_kernel
origfile="$(mktemp)" targetdir="$(mktemp -d)" extractdir="$(mktemp -d)"
# Download original release wget -O "${origfile}" "${RELEASEZIP}"
pushd "${targetdir}" unzip "${origfile}" popd
# Extract ramdisk extract_boot_image "${targetdir}/wanam/boot.img" "${extractdir}"
# Copy new kernel and kernel modules install_to "${extractdir}" boot.img
# Create new boot image rm "${targetdir}/wanam/boot.img" create_boot_image "${extractdir}" "${targetdir}/wanam/boot.img" boot.img
pushd "${targetdir}" zip -r "${WORKSPACE}/${RELEASEZIP##*/}" * popd
rm "${origfile}" rm -r "${targetdir}" rm -r "${extractdir}"
